author: vishaallsv@gmail.com
name: documentation-generator
description: The README Generator Agent is an intelligent automation tool that creates comprehensive, professional README files for open source projects. This agent leverages the power of AI to analyze GitHub repositories and generate well-structured documentation automatically.

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM calls (optional if OPENROUTER_API_KEY is set)
OpenRouter API key for LLM calls (free tier available). Takes precedence over OPENAI_API_KEY if both are set
GitHub access token used to fetch repository details
Directory where generated README files are written (default: ./output)
